items.title: Custom Design Session
features: Bespoke artwork created just for you

testimonials.quote: Absolutely blown away by the work here. The attention to detail is incredible and the whole team made me feel so comfortable. Will definitely be back for my next piece!
testimonials.author: Emma K.

testimonials.quote: Been going to Tooth and Talon for years now, never disappointed. Clean studio, talented artists, and they really listen to what you want. Highly recommend.
testimonials.author: Marcus D.

paragraphs: Tooth and Talon emerged from Manchester's vibrant Ancoats district with a simple philosophy: tattoos should be as fierce and authentic as the people who wear them. Our name reflects the primal power of great ink – sharp, bold, and unforgettable. Since opening our doors, we've built our reputation one satisfied client at a time, earning a perfect 5-star rating that speaks to our commitment to excellence.

Located in the heart of Manchester's creative quarter, our studio combines the raw energy of Ancoats with meticulous attention to detail. We specialise in custom work that captures your vision while pushing artistic boundaries. Whether you're after your first small piece or a full sleeve, we approach every tattoo with the same dedication to quality that's made us one of Manchester's most trusted studios.
about.callout: Every tattoo tells a story – we're here to help you tell yours with boldness and precision.
about.imageAlt: Tooth and Talon tattoo artist working on detailed custom piece in Manchester studio

items.question: Do you take walk-ins?
items.answer: Yes! We welcome walk-ins for smaller pieces and flash work, especially on weekdays. For larger custom pieces, we recommend booking ahead to ensure you get the time slot you want. Give us a call or pop by to check availability.

items.question: How much should I expect to pay?
items.answer: Pricing varies based on size, complexity, and placement. Small pieces typically start around £80, while larger custom work ranges from £200-400+. We always provide a clear quote before starting any work, and there are never any hidden fees.

items.question: What's your booking process like?
items.answer: For custom work, we start with a consultation to discuss your ideas and create the perfect design. We require a £50 deposit to secure your slot, which goes towards your final payment. The whole process is straightforward and we keep you updated every step of the way.

finalCta.headline: Ready for Your Next Tattoo?
finalCta.subheadline: Join the hundreds of satisfied clients who've trusted us with their ink

booking.modalDescription: Ready to get started? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to discuss your ideas and schedule your appointment.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for choosing Tooth and Talon. We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment details.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your booking, payable when we confirm your appointment
